passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > article > div > div > div > form > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > nav > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > nav > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > nav > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > h3:nth-child(1)
